data.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: There is no easy way from the earth to the stars
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: What man actually needs is not a tensionless state but rather the striving and struggling for some goal worthy of him.
data.author: Viktor Frankl

data.quote: If you find something very difficult to achieve yourself, don't imagine it impossible-for anything possible and proper for another person can be achieved as easily by you.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: To be like the rock that the waves keep crashing over. It stands unmoved and the raging of the sea falls still around it.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Many are harmed by fear itself, and many may have come to their fate while dreading fate
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: If it’s endurable, then endure it. Stop complaining.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: To bear trials with a calm mind robs misfortune of its strength and burden.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: If you would be a good reader, read; if a writer, write.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: ...but if a thing is humanly possible, consider it to be within your reach.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: Fire tries gold, misfortune tries brave men.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: True good fortune is what you make for yourself. Good fortune: good character, good intentions, good actions.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
data.author: Viktor Frankl

data.quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Choose not to be harmed—and you won’t feel harmed. Don’t feel harmed—and you haven’t been.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: No man is more unhappy than he who never faces adversity. For he is not permitted to prove himself
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: No great thing is created suddenly.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: There is no shame in making an honest effort.
data.author: Epictetus
